column5: Hi! I too have anxiety, but itâ€™s impulses to wash my hands or use hand sanitizer. What I decided I could try doing was if I felt the need to use hand sanitizer or wash my hands, I would wait x number of minutes before doing so, hoping the urge would pass. Perhaps you could try this too? Finish eating and wait 5-10 minutes to see if you are still hungry before buying.
YOU ARE AWESOME! Seriously congratulations. That is such a huge step!!
